name: background
label: Background image
description: Image covering the background of the board game.

name: size
label: Size
description: The size of the board game.

name: introduction
label: Introduction page
description: Introduction page shown when game is started

fields.name: startButtonText
fields.label: Text
fields.description: Text for the start/continue button on the intro page

name: loadImage
label: Loading image
description: Image shown while resources are loaded.

name: hotspots
label: Hotspots
description: List of hotspots in the game window where questions are found.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Title for hotspot. Will be displayed on hover.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Hotspot image
fields.description: Image used for the hotspot when the user has not completed the minigame.

fields.name: passedImage
fields.label: Hotspot passed image
fields.description: Image used for hotspot when user has passed the minigame.

fields.name: failedImage
fields.label: Hotspot failed image
fields.description: Image used for hotspot when user has passed the minigame.

fields.name: action
fields.label: Action
fields.description: What to do when clicking this hotspot.

fields.name: incremental
fields.label: Incremental progress
fields.description: Whether to incrementally step through the progress images, or to show image specifically for each hotspot.

fields.name: includeFailed
fields.label: Include Failed
fields.description: Whether to count minigame as answered in progress even if not passed.

name: endVideo
label: End video
description: Video displayed after the boardgame is finished.

name: endResults
label: End results page
description: Texts for the end results page shown when the user has finished the game

fields.name: text
fields.label: Text
fields.description: Text for the result. @score, @total and @percentage will be substituted in the output.

fields.name: solutionButtonText
fields.label: Text
fields.description: Text for the solution button. (Used to show the solution).
